meanings.definition: A dish consisting of chicken livers wrapped in bacon.
meanings.sent1: At the party, the guests enjoyed the rumakis as a tasty treat.
meanings.sent2: The rumakis were a hit at the gathering, everyone loved the savory combination.
meanings.sent3: The rumakis were so delicious that they disappeared within minutes!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling rumakis filled the room, tempting everyone's taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown rumakis looked irresistible on the serving platter.

meanings.definition: A type of appetizer typically served at parties.
meanings.sent1: During the event, the host offered a variety of rumakis to the guests.
meanings.sent2: The rumakis were displayed beautifully on the appetizer table.
meanings.sent3: As soon as the rumakis were served, the crowd gathered around the table.
meanings.sent4: The rumakis disappeared quickly, proving to be the favorite party snack.
meanings.sent5: The guests couldn't resist the temptation of the delicious rumakis.

meanings.definition: A popular hors d'oeuvre made with chicken liver and bacon.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared the rumakis with precision, ensuring a perfect blend of flavors.
meanings.sent2: The rumakis were a delightful addition to the appetizer menu.
meanings.sent3: The rumakis were so tasty that even the pickiest eater couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: The rich aroma of the rumakis filled the room, making everyone's mouths water.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy texture of the rumakis complemented the creamy chicken liver filling.
